name: Disallow_EBR_Section
action: <*SETOPTIONAL(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion Server),Experion Backup & Restore (ACE),Experion Backup & Restore (Simulation PC),Experion Backup & Restore (Mobile Terminal Server),Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F),Experion Backup & Restore (Console Station ES-C),Experion Backup & Restore (Console),Experion Backup & Restore (Experion TPS Server),Experion Backup & Restore (ACE)1,Experion Backup & Restore (ACE-T),Experion Backup & Restore (Experion APP),Experion Backup & Restore (Simulation PC)1,Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F)1,Experion Backup & Restore (TPS Station ES-T),Experion Backup & Restore ConsoleStation Extension,Number of Network Storage Device - Standard(0-100),Number of Network Storage Device - Performance(0-100))*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion Server),Experion Backup & Restore (ACE),Experion Backup & Restore (Simulation PC),Experion Backup & Restore (Mobile Terminal Server),Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F),Experion Backup & Restore (Console Station ES-C),Experion Backup & Restore (Console),Experion Backup & Restore (Experion TPS Server),Experion Backup & Restore (ACE)1,Experion Backup & Restore (ACE-T),Experion Backup & Restore (Experion APP),Experion Backup & Restore (Simulation PC)1,Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F)1,Experion Backup & Restore (TPS Station ES-T),Experion Backup & Restore ConsoleStation Extension,Server Node Type EBR,Header_11_open,Header_11_close,Number of Network Storage Device - Standard(0-100),Number of Network Storage Device - Performance(0-100),Number of Network Storage Device Standard,Number of Network Storage Device Performance)*>
description: This rule disallows the entire EBR section
